Parameters.Name: RECORDING-5-1-20 RECORDING CONTROL – RECORDING JOB CONFIGURATION EVENT

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-20 Features detection
Test.Name: GetServices and Digest suported
Test.Description: GetServices - supported. Digest - supported.

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-20 RECORDING CONTROL – RECORDING JOB CONFIGURATION EVENT
Test.Name: Correct response: one recording job
Test.Description: Check RECORDING-5-1-20 RECORDING CONTROL – RECORDING JOB CONFIGURATION EVENT test when DUT sends correct response with one recording job

Test.Name: Correct response: several recording jobs

Test.Name: Incorrect response: not unique recording job tokens
Test.Description: Check RECORDING-5-1-20 RECORDING CONTROL – RECORDING JOB CONFIGURATION EVENT test when DUT sends incorrect response with equal recording jobs tokens

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-20 RECORDING CONTROL – RECORDING JOB CONFIGURATION EVENT
Test.Name: No response on GetRecordingJobs
Test.Description: Check RECORDING-5-1-20 RECORDING CONTROL – RECORDING JOB CONFIGURATION EVENT test when DUT sends no response

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-20 RECORDING CONTROL – RECORDING JOB CONFIGURATION EVENT
Test.Name: Fault on GetRecordingJobs
Test.Description: Check RECORDING-5-1-20 RECORDING CONTROL – RECORDING JOB CONFIGURATION EVENT test when DUT sends fault

ExpectedResult.TestSummary:
RECORDING-5-1-20 RECORDING CONTROL – RECORDING JOB CONFIGURATION EVENT
STEP 1 - Get Recording Control service address Transmit done Receive done http://localhost:19266/onvif/ServiceRecording10/RecordingService.asmx STEP PASSED
STEP 2 - Check that the DUT returned Recording Control service address STEP PASSED
STEP 3 - Check that Recording service is accessible STEP PASSED
STEP 4 - Get Recording Jobs Transmit done Receive done SOAP fault returned Code: Receiver Subcode: ActionNotSupported Subcode: NoSuchService Reason: System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException: MESSAGE at DUT.CameraWebService.Base.BaseDutService.StepTypeProcessing(StepType stepType, SoapException ex, Int32 timeOut) in D:\ONVIF\DUT\CameraWebService\Base\BaseDutService.cs:line 46 at DUT.CameraWebService.Base.BaseDutService.ExecuteGetCommand(ParametersValidation validationRequest, GetMethodDelegate method) in D:\ONVIF\DUT\CameraWebService\Base\BaseDutService.cs:line 68 at DUT.CameraWebService.Recording10.RecordingService.GetRecordingJobs() in D:\ONVIF\DUT\CameraWebService\ServiceRecording10\RecordingService.asmx.cs:line 176 STEP FAILED
TEST FAILED

Test.Name: There is not expected event: no events
Test.Description: Check RECORDING-5-1-20 RECORDING CONTROL – RECORDING JOB CONFIGURATION EVENT test when DDUT sends PMs responses with no events Check that TT will wait operation delay for catching of event Check for different Operation delay values (10 s, 30 s, 60 s)

Test.Name: Required event after event for not tested job
Test.Description: Check RECORDING-5-1-20 RECORDING CONTROL – RECORDING JOB CONFIGURATION EVENT test when DUT sends correct response with one recording job

ExpectedResult.TestSummary:
RECORDING-5-1-20 RECORDING CONTROL – RECORDING JOB CONFIGURATION EVENT
STEP 1 - Get Recording Control service address Transmit done Receive done http://localhost:17934/ServiceRecording10/RecordingService.asmx STEP PASSED
STEP 2 - Check that the DUT returned Recording Control service address STEP PASSED
STEP 3 - Check that Recording service is accessible STEP PASSED
STEP 4 - Get Recording Jobs Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 5 - Check that all recording jobs have unique job token STEP PASSED
STEP 6 - Get Event service address Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 7 - Get Event Properties Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 8 - Check that the DUT provides event's topics. STEP PASSED
STEP 9 - Check that event with topic tns1:RecordingConfig/RecordingJobConfiguration is present STEP PASSED
STEP 10 - Checking description of event with topic tns1:RecordingConfig/RecordingJobConfiguration STEP PASSED
STEP 11 - Create Pull Point Subsciption Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 12 - Check that TerminationTime is specified STEP PASSED
STEP 13 - Validate CurrentTime and TerminationTime STEP PASSED
STEP 14 - Check if the DUT returned SubscriptionReference STEP PASSED
STEP 15 - Check if SubscriptionReference contains address STEP PASSED
STEP 16 - Check that URL specified is valid STEP PASSED
STEP 17 - Set Recording Job Configuration (jobToken = 'JobToken1') Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 18 - Send PullMessages request Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 19 - Validate CurrentTime and TerminationTime STEP PASSED
STEP 20 - Check that a maximum number of 1 Notification Messages is included in PullMessagesResponse STEP PASSED
STEP 21 - Response is not empty STEP PASSED
STEP 22 - Send PullMessages request Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 23 - Validate CurrentTime and TerminationTime STEP PASSED
STEP 24 - Check that a maximum number of 1 Notification Messages is included in PullMessagesResponse STEP PASSED
STEP 25 - Response is not empty STEP PASSED
STEP 26 - Checking that all required notifications are received STEP PASSED
STEP 27 - Validate messages Message with UTC time = 2012-12-01T07:18:40.321 is incorrect:
'Value' attribute has invalid value for 'RecordingJobToken' simple item.Expected: JobToken1, actual: JobToken2. STEP FAILED
STEP 28 - Send Unsubscribe request Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
TEST FAILED

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-20 RECORDING CONTROL – RECORDING JOB CONFIGURATION EVENT
Test.Name: Correct response: no recording jobs (Receiver service is supported, DynamicRecording=true)
Test.Description: 1. Refresh features with Feature ID = "Features.02" from TestSuites\Recording Control\Recording\Features.xml and run test 2. Refresh features with Feature ID = "Features.03" from TestSuites\Recording Control\Recording\Features.xml and run test Check RECORDING-5-1-20 RECORDING CONTROL – RECORDING JOB CONFIGURATION EVENT test when DUT sends correct response with empty recording job list
